Sept. 17, 1949 D National Youth Brass Band Championships
National Youth Brass Band Championships 10 Test Piece Contest National Youth Brass Band Championships of Great Britain national-youth-brass-band-championships
Mignonne
Belle Vue (Kings Hall), Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prizes 1st £50, 2nd £30, 3rd £20, 4th £15.
8 bands competed.
Feb. 17, 2012, 9:56 p.m. March 1, 2019, 3:07 p.m.

2 Highfield School Bradford Elizabeth Lumb
3 Ynyshir Band Gordon Harris
4 Grimethorpe Boys William Foster
